content: **updated pattern** if you downloaded the pattern before june 26 2013 please download again quick and fun to knit dishcloth combining my 2 favorite patterns granny s favorite and chinese waves knit diagonally using any cotton dishcloth yarn the size can be changed by making more or less stitches for the last row before decreasing alternating row of garter stitch granny s favorite and slip_stitch chinese waves make a dense fabric good for scrubbing dishes eyelet edging and yarn-over at the start of each row makes a nice border
